body:
Just an idea - if anyone at the workshop switches his video-enabled
mobile phone on, and everyone (especially the presenters) are happy with
that, I would happily accept to share the video from my host. Not
real-time, but a working stream. Feed-back is welcome... cheers and -
have a nice time folks in Berkley!!!

Lars.
subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance Workshop Live
